original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1111)@</color>以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(551)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>對前方範圍內敵方造成物理傷害，且在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(159)@</color> 秒內對範圍內敵方武將產生沉默狀態。
text: <color=#FFE787> Reply time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1111)@</color> to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(551)@</color> <color=#80cc00>War</color> inflicts physical damage on the enemy in the front range, and silences the enemy generals in the range within <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(159)@</color> seconds.
